title: How To Give Your Dog a Real Dog's Life and Make Him Love You for It
description: ‘How to Give Your Dog a Real Dog’s Life – and make him love you for doing it’ is the complete handbook on getting a dog and look after it, written by a dog-owner who is so passionate about dogs that his Buddhist wife is convinced that he was one in his last life!Owen Jones has shared his life with dogs ever since the first day of his life.He knows them so well that he’s sure that he can tell them jokes!This is a must read!
author: Owen  Jones
